question: Who is the President of the European Commission, who has represented the EU in the India-EU virtual summit?
explanation:
The 15th summit between the India and the European Union was held recently through a virtual mode. India was represented by Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
The EU was represented by Ursula von der Leyen, President of the European Commission and Charles Michel, President of the European Council.  The leaders adopted the "India-EU Strategic Partnership: A Roadmap to 2025‚Äù, a strategic guide for mutual cooperation, over the next five years.
